turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there. I'm good. I'd like to get a pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get pineapple ham. And I'd like to make sure there is extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a medium extra cheese hawaiian pizza with onion right? Just one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes to the Hawaiian pizza, but no onion. And four pizzas, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: oh sorry and for for that's going to be $72.33.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Could I have a recount of what I ordered, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's 4 medium extra cheese hawaiian pizzas for $72.33.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Okay, that's sounds good. You can place the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your order will be ready in 30 minutes and you'll get it via mobile.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem, have a good day.
